Speech by President Ilham Aliyev at the youth meeting - http://www.president.az/articles/2000
The program should be very concrete, very accurate tasks should be set and, of course, there should be the implementation mechanisms. #Azerbaijan
At the same time, the program should be such that the problems that young people are currently facing should be resolved. #Azerbaijan
There is a problem of unemployment in the country, which worries us and we should be more active in eliminating unemployment.
One of the most serious issues facing us is the training of professional staff. #Azerbaijan
We would like local cadres to dominate new businesses, especially in the service sector, in the tourism sector, and in the ICT sector.
Modernization, of course, depends on the proper formulation of public policy and, at the same time, the activities of young people. #Azerbaijan
The Azerbaijani youth should be devoted to modern, homeland, nation, statehood. #Azerbaijan
Further work should be done to improve vocational training. #Azerbaijan
The State Oil Fund allocates funds for youth education abroad. #Azerbaijan
If we had the level we wanted to study, we would probably not have needed it. #Azerbaijan
I want to see Azerbaijan as a country with modern, high intellectual potential, not as a country producing oil.
At present, special attention should be paid to the activities of vocational schools. #Azerbaijan
The process of modern state building is based on careful attitude to historical past, culture and national roots in Azerbaijan.
Our science should grow even faster and help solve the challenges facing the country. #Azerbaijan
Young people should be involved in scientific research and technical assistance. #Azerbaijan
I support the idea of ​​creating intellectual clubs. I think we have to take this initiative. #Azerbaijan
I believe that creating business incubators is very important. We will pay attention to this and must reflect in the program #Azerbaijan
Relevant guidelines have been provided for the involvement of foreign teachers in Azerbaijan, and this process is gradually beginning. #Azerbaijan
With respect to the application of a single student card: if there is such practice in the world, let's learn it and we will apply it. #Azerbaijan
I like the idea of ​​building a Youth Center in Baku. I think it can be a good project. #Azerbaijan
We will deal with the repair of emergency schools in 2011 and 2012, and will bring them all to a high level. #Azerbaijan
We are working hard to develop our country so that every citizen is rightly proud of being a citizen of independent Azerbaijan.
